data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Muzaffarpur, Bihar, India a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Muzaffarpur, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 4,801,100 people living in the county of Muzaffarpur.
Jesus, please help the 52,812 believers in the county of Muzaffarpur to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Muzaffarpur, Bihar, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Bhuinhar people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, encourage the church of Muzaffarpur, Bihar, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Muzaffarpur with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Muzaffarpur.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

location.name: Muzaffarpur
location.people_groups_list: Kalwar Iraqi (Hindu traditions), Rajput Kinwar, Bhar, Abdul, Sonar Tejania
